id: scenario-value-scanner-parent-scenarios-community-community learning spaces for parent education and support

title: Community learning spaces for parent education and support
description: Community learning spaces for parent education and support
content:
Scenario: Community learning spaces for parent education and support
    Given parents need ongoing education and skill development
    And Sarah both teaches and learns from other parents
    When the community_elohim coordinates parent education
    Then it should provide spaces for parent learning and skill-sharing
    And it should recognize teaching labor and learning participation
    And parent education should be accessible and valued
    And the community should invest in parent capability-building
    And the system should create communities of practice for parents
    And parenting skills should be continuously developed
